title: File Annual OSHA Injury Summary
description: It's the end of the calendar year. A safety director must compile and electronically file the OSHA Form 300A, the summary of work-related injuries and illnesses.

tasks.description: Compile all OSHA 300 logs for the company for the past calendar year.
Generate the summary data required for Form 300A, including total number of cases, days away from work, etc.
tasks.expected_outcome: The summary data is accurately calculated.

tasks.description: Submit the summary data through OSHA's Injury Tracking Application (ITA) website.
tasks.expected_outcome: The annual report is successfully filed with the regulatory agency.
